Reviews.Title: Good camera, but not for "amateurs"
Reviews.Author: J. Ward
Reviews.Content: The camera came with only generic operating instructions.  There are controls on the camera that are not mentioned in the product literature.  When I asked Warehouseseller about this I was told that the camera must be installed by a "professional" and that the controls are only for a "professional" to use.  Using them incorrectly could cause permanent damage to the camera.  This is a terrible omission by Warehouseseller. The cameras work well even though installed by an "amateur". Just lucky I didn't touch anything, I guess...

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: gustavo valverde
Reviews.Content: you need to be carefull, is a great camera so you need put atention to take the best image, come with all you need

Reviews.Title: UV Camera for a theater
Reviews.Author: anthony johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use as a stage manager monitor for our high school theater.  The camera is mounted in the back of the theater.  In pitch black environment the camera picks up actors and sets as far as 100 feet away.  I'm very pleased with the detail of this camera, especially for the price.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, Color DSP
Weatherproof outdoor housing, stand for use in all weather conditions, IP66, cable through bracket
700 TV Lines horizontal resolution, NTSC System. OSD menu adjustment
Build-in 4-9mm zoom focus lens and 42 infrared leds for night vision
Package included: 1 x high resolution camera, 1 x power supply and 1 x security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Day Night Outdoor Bullet Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD DSP 4-9mm Varifocal Lens OSD Menu IR Infrared Illumination LEDs for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Security Warning Decal A78
